de.brands4friends.daleq.core

Interface Context


  • public interface Context
    Provides access to contextual information needed while building a Table.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T> T getService(java.lang.Class<T> service)
      A service lookup.

    • Method Detail

      • getService

        <T> T getService(java.lang.Class<T> service)
        A service lookup.

        The Context holds a service registry. Building a table requires access all of these services. This method decouples the public API from exposing the actual services. Which services are registered is implementation depending and my change.

        Parameters:
        service - the class of a requested service.
        Returns:
        If the Context has a registered implementation for requested servive, the implementation is returned, otherwise an exception is thrown.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the Context does not have the requested service.
